title: How do i change my email without the old address
body: I just dont know how cant find other grp for it

replies.body: Hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our account agents should be able to find a way to help after  verifying you created the account ^_^. Make sure you pick the option "I need help recovering my account"!
